pkgmetadata.longdescription: This package allows Python clients running on any operatingsystem to provide NTLM authentication to a supporting server.python-ntlm is probably most useful on platforms that are notWindows, since on Windows it is possible to take advantage ofplatform-specific NTLM support.This is also useful for passing hashes to servers requiringntlm authentication in instances where using windows tools is not desirable.
